QuestData.Title: The Farstrider Enclave
QuestData.Description: Magisters and Farstriders may not see eye to eye all the time, $n. When it comes to Dar'Khan, however, we're all in agreement that a way must be found to defeat him and his legions.$B$BRanger Vynna, at the Farstrider Enclave northeast of here, has come across important information regarding our enemy. Speak to her and see if you can be of assistance.
QuestData.LogDescription: Magister Kaendris, at the Sanctum of the Sun, wants you to talk to Ranger Vynna at the Farstrider Enclave in the Ghostlands.
QuestData.RewardText: Kaendris sent you? I might have a task for you, $c.
